title: Miraclesuit Women's Swimwear Pyrite Jubilee Soft Cup Adjustable Strap Tankini Bathing Suit Top
features: Look 10 lbs. lighter in 10 seconds® with Miraclesuit. Our exclusive Miratex® fabric slims and slenderizes without panels or linings for total full body shaping & control.
Built in soft cups provide gentle, comfortable shaping and support to create an hourglass shape. Layered front flyaway styling helps conceal your tummy. Bottom sold separately.
Adjustable lingerie straps let you find the perfect fit. The cleverly draped fabric makes you appear taller and thinner instantly.

SIZING: Order a swimsuit in your usual size for the most comfortable and slimming fit. Sizing up is suggested depending on your fit preference or if you prefer a less snug fit. For bust, measure across the fullest part of the breast. For waist, measure the narrowest part of your waist, above your belly button. For hip, measure across the hips about 4 inches below your belly button. For torso, measure between your legs and over the top of the shoulder. REFER TO SIZE CHART ON LEFT.

After each use, hand wash your Miraclesuit in cool, clear water and hang to dry. Do not use chlorine bleach. Do not iron or tumble dry. Following these instructions will help extend the lifespan of your swimsuit so you can enjoy it even longer
description: Once you put on this tankini top separate from Miraclesuit, you'll never want to take it off. The built in soft cups offer gentle shaping while the all over black and white print is so classic. A layered front flyway fit is the single best way to camouflage excess pounds in your midsection, especially when you pair it with a high-waisted solid swim bottom. Adjustable lingerie straps allow you to customize the fit to your exact specifications. Whether you've got beach plans or pool plans, this is the single most important swim separate you'll ever own. What is The Miracle? "Look 10 lbs. lighter in 10 seconds” is more than just a tagline – it’s a promise. Our unique and innovative Miratex® fabric delivers three times the control of ordinary swimwear fabrics while remaining totally comfortable and allowing full range of motion. There are no panels or linings – just slimming, slenderizing control for all over shaping you need to see to believe. All Miraclesuit swimwear features sophisticated prints and sleek, contemporary styling that’s on trend and totally timeless. At Miraclesuit, we believe in curves. Strategic draping and shirring create an hourglass shaped silhouette, which helps highlight your best features. This swimsuit is made for any body type and flatters every unique figure. When a woman wears her Miraclesuit, she feels confident and beautiful both inside and out. Miraclesuit is created like no other swimsuit in the world. Try it on once and you'll love it forever, guaranteed.
